channel.title: JS Implementation on IPFS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in JS Implementation on IPFS Documentation

item.title: Working with IPFS in JS
item.description: There are two main JavaScript libraries for working with IPFS. Both work in Node.js and in modern web browsers: js-ipfs is a full implementation of IPFS, similar to go-ipfs. You can use it either as a command-line application or as a library to start an IPFS node directly in your program. js-ipfs-http-client is a smaller library that controls an IPFS node that is already running via its HTTP API.
